document_data.name: Sarth
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarth''' was the [[Khôltar|Khôltan]] name for [[ox]] and [[horse]] meat served on a [[skewer]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|73}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 57: Khôltar, Part 8, A First Look at Handrornlar}}
document_data.Description: This dish was available in Khôltar, the Iron City, at various establishments, but most notably from [[Taurgaur's Tarjteir]], an inn and luthdren (restaurant) that catered to [[dwarves]]. The meats were cut into cubes and marinated in various strong-flavored sauces for about a month. Skewers were stacked with alternating pieces of horse and ox meat from different vats, broiled, and served.
